allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add project structure and chunk plans

- Created Maven pom.xml with MCP SDK, Jackson, Lombok dependencies
- Set up package structure for all 7 chunks
- Added individual chunk plans in plans/ directory
- Updated README with quick start and features
- Added comprehensive .gitignore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git merge feature/resource-prompt-handlers-and-enhanced-params --no-ff -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge feature/resource-prompt-handlers-and-enhanced-params

This merge adds comprehensive support for MCP resources, prompts, and enhanced
parameter descriptions to fastMCP4J.

Features:
- ResourceHandler and PromptHandler implementations for MCP protocol
- @McpParam annotation for rich parameter metadata \(descriptions, examples, constraints\)
- Enhanced JSON schema generation with LLM-friendly hints
- Full test coverage with all 27 tests passing

Commits:
- feat: Implement ResourceHandler, PromptHandler, and enhanced parameter descriptions
- feat: ResourceHandler and PromptHandler implementations
- fix: Complete ResourceHandler and PromptHandler integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
